movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the task of planting an idea.

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.description: A writer encounters the owner of a declining hotel who recounts his early years as a lobby boy.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological tests.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.description: A 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in tales of violence.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
movies.description: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and meets others from different dimensions.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

movies.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
movies.description: A Chinese-American immigrant is swept up in an adventure across multiple universes.

movies.title: Blade Runner 2049
movies.description: A young blade runner discovers a secret that leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.description: A young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where dreams are mentored by a ruthless instructor.

movies.title: Get Out
movies.description: A young man visits his girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his uneasiness reaches a boiling point.

movies.title: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A meek Hobbit and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring.

movies.title: Coco
movies.description: Aspiring musician Miguel enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather.

movies.title: Joker
movies.description: A mentally troubled comedian is disregarded by society, embarking on a downward spiral of crime.

movies.title: Alien
movies.description: A space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission and is attacked by a mysterious life form.

movies.title: Inglourious Basterds
movies.description: In Nazi-occupied France, a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers plan to assassinate Nazi leaders.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.description: An F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated cannibal to catch another serial killer.

movies.title: Arrival
movies.description: A linguist works with the military to communicate with aliens after spacecraft appear around the world.

movies.title: Oppenheimer
movies.description: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

movies.title: Memento
movies.description: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

movies.title: The Prestige
movies.description: Two stage magicians in 1890s London engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion.

movies.title: Eternal Sunshine
movies.description: A couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

movies.title: Dune: Part Two
movies.description: Paul Atreides unites with the Fremen while on a warpath of revenge against conspirators.

movies.title: WALL-E
movies.description: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot embarks on a space journey.

movies.title: No Country for Old Men
movies.description: A hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and two million dollars in cash.

movies.title: Shutter Island
movies.description: A U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer from an insane asylum.

movies.title: Your Name
movies.description: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way through their dreams.

movies.title: Toy Story
movies.description: A cowboy doll is threatened when a new spaceman figure becomes a boy's favorite toy.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.description: A power failure causes dinosaurs to run loose at a pragmatic theme park.

movies.title: Grandma's Boy
movies.description: A video game tester has to move in with his grandmother and her two old lady friends.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.description: A lion prince is targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a soap maker form an underground fight club.

movies.title: Se7en
movies.description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.
